https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hqwWHeHRHSMiw6xxMvLvFZYMSX4.jpg Chul-soo is a man with an intellectual disability. One day, Chul-soo finds out that a young girl, Saet-byul, who is in hospital is his daughter. And soon, Saet-byul sneaks out of the hospital and travels by herself to a faraway city for her friend's birthday. As Chul-soo accompanies Saet-byul's journey, friendship develops between the two. Cheer Up, Mr. Lee
